text: Soni tungajitende kuŵa Qur’an jangaŵa jacharabu, chisimu angatite: “Ligongo chichi ma Ȃya gakwe ngagakusalichisyidwa chenene? Ana (Chitabu nikuŵa) changaŵa chacharabu, sano (Ntume nikuŵa) mwarabu?” Jilani: “Chalakwecho (Chitabucho) kwa aŵala ŵaakulupilile chiŵele chongolo ni chiposyo. Sano aŵala ŵangakukulupilila m’mawiwi mwao mwana usiiwa, nambo soni jalakwe (Qur’anijo) kukwao jiŵele ungalola, ŵanganyao (ngaakupikana, agambile kuŵa nti chisawu) akuŵilanjidwa kuumila pamalo pakutalichila.”
